npcs.name: Cog Burn
utterances: How fortunate for me!  More adventurers!  Whee!  Come now, come here.

You're just in time!  Yes, yes, just in time to help me continue my research.  With the popping and smoke, poofing!  So, so very exciting!  All you have to do is fetch me the smashed remains of these undead orcs.
Of course you have to smash them before they're any good to me.  Nothing worse than components trying to eliminate the tinker! We don't want that to happen again, I'm telling you.  I was not amused.
Good, good!  I'm glad we agree. You fetch me what I need, and I'll see what I can do for you.  You can trust me ... can't you?  Oh, no matter.
Marvelous!  Just fine, most satisfactory, absolutely acceptable.  Hmm!  Not bad even ... What?  What is it?  What are you looking at!?
Hello again! Lovely day for a bit of doom, wouldn't you say?

npcs.name: Garreg Stonecrusher
utterances: A spy is in our midst, kill them!
Full retreat!  Regroup in the caves!
